Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2010 10:26PM trubev wrote: My bone mets resolved while on xeloda & I only had 4 infusions of zomets as my onc is extremly cautious about side effects.  He had one patient with jaw necrosis & I actually know someone who had to have part of her jaw & teeth removed due to it.  I am doing well & am managing the h/f syndrome.  I can't tell you how many creams I've used or how much money I've spent & still haven't found anything that good.  Going to the podiatrist has helped as I started getting ingrown nails as a result of the meds.  As long as I keep things in check, I am good to go. The cuts on the fingers are another headache but I bandage my fingers & use silvadine or ointment I get from the dermatology office where I work (lucky me).  I'm not a happy camper but it helps in the healing process.  I've gone thru hundreds of knuckle bandages (got 6 big boxes from the girls at work).  Like I said, lucky me to work in a dr's office.  You can't even buy the large boxes in a drug store.  Do what works for you but keep on top of it.
Posts.Title: WHO HAS DONE WELL ON XELODA imbell Rich66
